text: This is a list of New Zealand's official representatives and their placements at the Big Four international beauty pageants, considered the most important in the world. The country has won two victories: * One — Miss Universe crown (1983) * One — Miss International crowns (1971) ==New Zealand's Big Four titleholders== New Zealand has been represented in the Big Four international beauty pageants, the four major international beauty pageants for women. These are Miss World, Miss Universe, Miss International and Miss Earth. ;Color Key {| class="wiki table" border="3" cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 0 1em 0 0; background: white; border:
